text: @washingtonpost “Trump was first briefed on the coronavirus by Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar on Jan. 18...In the days and weeks after Azar alerted him about the virus, Trump spoke at eight rallies and golfed six times as if he didn’t have a care in the world.”
